label: Special Topics
description: Lecture courses in topics of current interest; specific subject matter will be announced in the Class Schedule. 1 to 4 undergraduate hours. 1 to 4 graduate hours. Approved for both letter and S/U grading. Prerequisite: See Class Schedule for section requirements.
